entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 11:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -1
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning overnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1000 metres in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight and ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 18 February 2023
